languages.text: {n}Зычный голос, доносящийся из-под черного шлема, полон презрения и плохо сдерживаемой ярости.{/n} "Злоба, уйми свое непеределанное мясо. Иначе оно не доберется до арены".
{n}The booming voice that erupts from under the helmet is full of scorn and barely contained fury.{/n} "Bring your untransformed meat to heel, Malice, or it will not even make it to the pit."
languages.original_text: {n}Зычный голос, доносящийся из-под черного шлема, полон презрения и плохо сдерживаемой ярости.{/n} "Злоба, уйми свое непеределанное мясо. Иначе оно не доберется до арены".

traits.locale_text: {n}The booming voice erupting from under the helm is full of scorn and barely contained fury.{/n} "Bring your unaugmented meat to heel, Malice, or it will not even make it to the pit."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}ヘルメットの下から沸き上がる声は、軽蔑とかろうじて抑えられた怒りに満ちている。{/n}「マリス、その軟弱な肉体に従わせるんだ。さもなくば闘技場にすらたどり着けないぞ」
languages.original_text: {n}The booming voice that erupts from under the helmet is full of scorn and barely contained fury.{/n} "Bring your untransformed meat to heel, Malice, or it will not even make it to the pit."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヘルメットの下から沸き上がる声は、軽蔑とかろうじて抑えられた怒りに満ちている。{/n}「マリス、その軟弱な肉体に従わせるんだ。さもなくば闘技場にすらたどり着けないぞ」
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}头盔下面传来了低沉的低音，充满了蔑视与毫不掩饰的愤怒。{/n}“管好这只没改造过的活畜，恶棍，否则它进不了竞技场就得没命。”
languages.original_text: {n}The booming voice that erupts from under the helmet is full of scorn and barely contained fury.{/n} "Bring your untransformed meat to heel, Malice, or it will not even make it to the pit."

traits.locale_text: {n}头盔下面传来了低沉的低音，充满了蔑视与毫不掩饰的愤怒。{/n}“管好你的活畜，恶棍，否则它进不了竞技场就得没命。”
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}La estruendosa voz que surge del casco está cargada de desprecio y furia apenas contenida.{/n} «Controla a tu carne sin transformar, Malicia, o no llegará siquiera a la fosa».
languages.original_text: {n}The booming voice that erupts from under the helmet is full of scorn and barely contained fury.{/n} "Bring your untransformed meat to heel, Malice, or it will not even make it to the pit."

traits.locale_text: {n}La estruendosa voz que surge del casco está cargada de desprecio y furia apenas contenida.{/n} «Controla a tu carne sin aumentos, Malicia, o no llegará siquiera a la fosa».
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}Die dröhnende Stimme, die aus dem Helm ertönt, ist voller Verachtung und kaum verhohlener Wut.{/n} "Bringt Euer untransformiertes Fleisch unter Kontrolle, Tücke, sonst schafft es nicht einmal den Weg ins Loch."
languages.original_text: {n}The booming voice that erupts from under the helmet is full of scorn and barely contained fury.{/n} "Bring your untransformed meat to heel, Malice, or it will not even make it to the pit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die dröhnende Stimme, die aus dem Helm ertönt, ist voller Verachtung und kaum verhohlener Wut.{/n} "Bringt Euer unaugmentiertes Fleisch unter Kontrolle, Tücke, sonst schafft es nicht einmal den Weg ins Loch."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}La voix qui jaillit du casque suinte de mépris et d'une fureur à peine contenue.{/n} « Disciplinez votre viande, Malice, ou elle pourrait bien ne jamais arriver jusqu'à l'arène. »
languages.original_text: {n}The booming voice that erupts from under the helmet is full of scorn and barely contained fury.{/n} "Bring your untransformed meat to heel, Malice, or it will not even make it to the pit."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix qui jaillit du casque suinte de mépris et d'une fureur à peine contenue.{/n} « Disciplinez votre viande, Malice, ou elle pourrait bien ne jamais arriver jusqu'à l'arène. »
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}Miğferin altından patlarcasına çıkan, aşağılama dolu gür ses; öfkesini güçlükle tutabiliyor.{/n} "Melanet, dönüşmemiş etini hizaya getirmezsen çukura bile ulaşamaz."
languages.original_text: {n}The booming voice that erupts from under the helmet is full of scorn and barely contained fury.{/n} "Bring your untransformed meat to heel, Malice, or it will not even make it to the pit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Miğferin altından patlarcasına çıkan aşağılamayla dolu gür ses, öfkesini güçlükle tutabiliyor.{/n} "Dönüşmemiş etini hizaya getir Melanet yoksa çukura bile ulaşamaz."
traits.speaker: WrackServant
